# COSMIC Application Collection
A collection of COSMIC applications developed by the community.

| Name | Description | Image |
|---|---|---|
| [cosmic-todo](https://github.com/edfloreshz/cosmic-todo) | A simple to-do app for the COSMIC desktop. | <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/edfloreshz/cosmic-todo/main/res/screenshots/window.png" alt="cosmic-todo" width="200"/> |
| [fan-control](https://github.com/wiiznokes/fan-control) | Control your fans with different behaviors. | <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/78230769/290960467-cdc30753-4186-47a1-ba49-11af3868380f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..MGVa6nEKOUaCwqaKRNExAv491DJLQ01oH3KnV4igeIk" alt="fan-control" width="200"/> |
## How to add your applet?
To add your applet to this list, please open a pull request with your applet added to the `applications.ron` file.
